footerFootnote: We are Rockfeather. We use Data Visualization, Data Science, Data Engineering, Process Mining and Low-Code technology to build smart solutions. Together with our customers, we create best-in-class solutions for various industries and functions. Therefore, this is how we embrace technology and empower ambitious people.

paragraphs.headline: WIP - How to add a tool ?
values: The radar acts as an overview of technologies that we everyone should know about.

rings.description: We can clearly recommend this technology. We have used it for longer period of time in different teams and it has proven to be stable and useful.
rings.name: Adopt

rings.description: We have used it with success and recommend to have a closer look at the technology in this ring. The goal of items here is to look at them more closely, with the goal to bring them to the adopt level.
rings.name: Trial

rings.description: We have tried it out and we find it promising. We recommend having a look at these items when you face a specific need for the technology in your project.
rings.name: Assess

rings.description: This category is a bit special. Unlike the others, we recommend to stop doing or using something. That does not mean that they are bad and it often might be ok to use them in existing projects. But we move things here if we think we shouldn't do them anymore - because we see better options or alternatives now.
rings.name: Hold

pageHelp.ringsPreDescription: Each of the items is classified in one of these rings:

sourcecodeLink.description: Contributions and source code of the AOE Tech Radar are on github:
sourcecodeLink.name: AOE Tech Radar on Github
